summary: Comprehensive testing of ISEMS (Intelligent Solar Energy Management System) completed. Backend APIs 87.5% successful, frontend fully functional with excellent UI/UX and seamless integration.

flaky_endpoints.issue: Returns success: false despite successful message, likely Blynk integration issue
flaky_endpoints.impact: Load control functionality may not work reliably

passed_tests: Dashboard API with real ThingSpeak data
Solar, Battery, Grid APIs with historical data
Frontend login page with theme toggle
Dashboard with 4 metric cards and charts
Load control page with professional UI
action_item_for_main_agent: Fix Blynk integration in load control API - the endpoint returns success: false even when operation appears successful. Check Blynk authentication token and API calls.
